dct_title_s: Map of the City of New York
dct_description_sm: Map is on 12 sheets, 2 are missing. The streets of the five boroughs are on the map. Waterways include: Kill Van Kull, Arthur Kills, Newark Bay, Passaic River, Upper Bay, East River, and Hudson River. Ellis Island, Bedloes Island, and Governors Island, pier and bulkhead lines in the upper bay.
dcat_keyword_sm: Long Island Sound   and Conn. --Hudson County
